activities: Personal data is used to compile global Company headcount and to report summarized reports for equal opportunity practices.  In addition personal data is used for record keeping of stock related actions.
personaldata: Human Resource Data, including manually processed data
recoursemech: As per the Zoran Policy, employees "who are not satisfied with the results of internal review, complaint, or appeal procedures (or any applicable grievance procedures under a contract with a trade union or other entity) are directed to seek relief from the provincial, state, or national data protection or labor authority in the jurisdiction where such employees work."
